ComicInfo.Summary:
John Lynch regrets killing so many people during his life as a merc, but finds himself pulled back into the shadowy world of his past when he discovers a terrible problem that requires his expertise.
John Lynch started to regret killing so many people in his life as a merc. He soon founs out he had a terrible problem. Would he take on his last mission or will he be dead by dawn?
ComicInfo.Writer: Brandon Choi,Jim Lee,Steve Gerber,Brandon Choi,Jim Lee,Steve Gerber
ComicInfo.Title: Image Comics Presents: The Cybernary
ComicInfo.Editor: Deborah Marvin,J. Herman Mendoza,J. Herman Mendoza
